title: Analysis of f from graph of f' part - b

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of f′ , the derivative of a function f. The domain of f is the set of all real numbers x such that−10≤x≤10.
content.question: For what values of x in the interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mrow> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 10 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mn> 10 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> does f have a relative maximum? Justify your answer
